Name: CollectApplesQuest
Title: Apples for Chuhayster
Description: I want to taste those sweet fruits, that you, humans, grow. I think they are called apples. Can you please find some and bring them to me?

Name: CollectLingonberriesQuest
Title: Berries for Chuhayster
Description: I crave some berries. Can you help me?

Name: KillMavkasQuest
Title: Wicked mavkas
Description: Those mavkas drive me crazy. Not only do they always try to cause mischief to me, but they also lure men to the forest just for fun. Can you get rid of some of them nearby?

Name: CollectSopilkaQuest
Title: Missing sopilka
Description: I lost my sopilka somewhere in the forest and can't play my melodies anymore. Only you can help me!

Name: KillNichnytsyasQuest
Title: Night noises
Description: Loud noises and screams disturb my rest every night. I'm pretty sure nichnytsyas make these sounds. Can you deal with them for me?

Name: CollectMintQuest
Title: Herbal tea for Domovyk
Description: I want to make some mint tea, but unfortunately, I have no leaves left. Can you please find some and bring them to me?
Objectives: Bring 5 bundles of mint leaves to Domovyk

Name: CollectFlowersQuest
Title: Flowers for Domovyk
Description: I want to decorate our home with flowers to make it more cozy. Please gather some in the forest.

Name: KillZlydensQuest
Title: Annoying zlydens
Description: I am afraid some zlydens can settle down in our house, as you often cross paths with them in the forest. Can you please prevent it?

Name: CollectBlueberriesQuest
Title: Blueberries for Domovyk
Description: I want to make blueberry pie for us, but I'm out of blueberries. Go to the forest and gather some, please!

Name: CollectHareMeatQuest
Title: Starving villagers
Description: We don`t have much food this year, and I believe it is an act of evil power. Can you hunt some hares for me? I am afraid to step deep into the forest because of wolves.

Name: KillPoterchasQuest
Title: Strange lights
Description: Some villagers saw strange moving lights in the forest not far from the houses, and now everyone is afraid to go outside in the evening. Can you solve our problem?

Name: KillWolvesQuest
Title: Protecting villagers from wolves
Description: Too many wolves have been in the forest as of late, and they are hurting our ships. Can you reduce their number?

Name: KillBearsQuest
Title: Wild beasts
Description: Some of the villagers saw bears close to the place where they were herding sheep. The situation is becoming dangerous, so can you help us, as we are less brave than you?

Name: KillChortsQuest
Title: Cunning evil
Description: So many bad things are happening in our village that it must be chorts. But we are no match for them, you know this. Can you kill them, of course, for some good reward?
